author: Sophia Lavcanski
title: Maden in der M√ºlltonne bei Sommer-Hitze: So l√§sst sich das Ungeziefer bek√§mpfen
text:
Maden in der M√ºlltonne bei Sommer-Hitze: So l√§sst sich das Ungeziefer bek√§mpfen
In den hei√üen Sommermonaten haben viele mit einem Problem zu k√§mpfen: Maden in der M√ºlltonne. Doch es gibt einfache Ma√ünahmen, um die kleinen Larven wieder loszuwerden.
Wenn die Temperaturen steigen, vermehren sich Insekten besonders schnell ‚Äì auch rund um den Hausm√ºll. Fliegen nutzen die Hitze, um ihre Eier in den Tonnen abzulegen. Daraus entwickeln sich innerhalb kurzer Zeit wei√üe Maden. Diese treten meist in gro√üer Zahl auf und sorgen trotz ihrer Harmlosigkeit bei vielen f√ºr Ekel. Doch wie l√§sst sich das verhindern?
Maden vorbeugen: Mit einfachen Ma√ünahmen den Befall verhindern
Um Maden erst gar keine Chance zu geben, sollte der M√ºll regelm√§√üig entsorgt werden. Eine w√∂chentliche Leerung der Tonne und anschlie√üende Reinigung kann schon viel ausrichten.
Wichtig ist au√üerdem, dass der Deckel immer gut verschlossen bleibt. Wer noch mehr Schutz m√∂chte, kann eine Gummidichtung am Deckelrand anbringen oder einen speziellen Deckel f√ºr Biotonnen verwenden.
M√ºll trocken halten ‚Äì Maden m√∂gen es feucht und warm
Da sich Maden besonders in feuchten und warmen Umgebungen wohlf√ºhlen, sollte der M√ºll m√∂glichst trocken bleiben. Vor allem im Biom√ºll wird Feuchtigkeit schnell zum Problem. Der Restm√ºll ist meist recht luftdicht in Plastikt√ºten eingepackt, wodurch wenig ein und ausdringt. echo24.de erkl√§rt, wann M√ºll in eine T√ºte geh√∂rt und wann nicht.
Laut ‚ÄûGEO‚Äú helfen beim Trockenhalten von M√ºlltonnen Materialien wie Zeitungspapier, S√§gesp√§ne, trockenes Gras oder Heu, um Feuchtigkeit zu binden. All diese Materialien d√ºrfen auch in die Biotonne. Auch der Standort der Tonne spielt eine Rolle: Sie sollte an einem k√ºhlen, trockenen Platz stehen.
So wird man Maden wieder los ‚Äì einfache Hausmittel im Einsatz
Hat sich der Nachwuchs der Fliegen bereits breitgemacht oder war die Vorsorge nicht erfolgreich, gibt es laut ‚ÄûGEO‚Äú einfache Hausmittel gegen Maden. Eine M√∂glichkeit: Kalk in die Tonne streuen. Der entzieht den Maden Feuchtigkeit. Auch Gesteinsmehl kann verwendet werden.
Wer eine Spr√ºhflasche hat, kann auf zwei bew√§hrte Mischungen zur√ºckgreifen: Entweder Wasser mit mehreren Essl√∂ffeln Essig oder Essigessenz, oder eine Mischung aus einem Liter abgekochtem Wasser mit einem Essl√∂ffel Pfeffer. Beide L√∂sungen lassen sich direkt auf die Maden spr√ºhen.
Selbst gebaute M√ºckenfalle gegen neue Eier
Um zu verhindern, dass neue Fliegen ihre Eier ablegen, empfiehlt ‚ÄûGEO‚Äú den Bau einer einfachen M√ºckenfalle: Daf√ºr zwei Teile Wasser mit drei Teilen Fruchtsaft, einem Teil Essig und einigen Tropfen Sp√ºlmittel mischen. Die Mischung in ein Glas geben und direkt neben der Biotonne aufstellen. Das Sp√ºlmittel reduziert die Oberfl√§chenspannung ‚Äì Fliegen, die auf der Fl√ºssigkeit landen, ertrinken sofort.

author: Vinicius Marques
title: XWatch 3 WE: Infinix lan√ßa seu 1¬∫ smartwatch no mercado brasileiro
text:
üí≤ Ofertas
Tecnologia
XWatch 3 WE: Infinix lan√ßa seu 1¬∫ smartwatch no mercado brasileiro
A Infinix anunciou a chegada do XWatch 3 WE ao mercado brasileiro ‚Äî o primeiro smartwatch da marca a chegar oficialmente ao pa√≠s. Ele promete atrair consumidores que buscam recursos de monitoramento de atividades f√≠sicas e sa√∫de por um pre√ßo mais acess√≠vel.
Confira a ficha t√©cnica
O dispositivo entra no Brasil com um display AMOLED de 1,43 polegada com resolu√ß√£o de 466 x 466 pixels e suporte para a tecnologia de display sempre ativo. A bateria de 300 mAh do dispositivo, segundo a fabricante, pode proporcionar at√© 10 dias de energia.
O produto, assim como seus concorrentes do segmento, conta com um conjunto de sensores para monitoramento de indicadores de sa√∫de. Isso inclui satura√ß√£o de oxig√™nio no sangue e frequ√™ncia card√≠aca, al√©m de diversas atividades esportivas, incluindo modalidades aqu√°ticas ‚Äî j√° que tamb√©m disp√µe de certifica√ß√£o IP68, de resist√™ncia contra √°gua e poeira.
‚ÄúO XWatch 3 WE mescla tecnologia, bem-estar e estilo, e assim atende √†s principais necessidades de usu√°rios que querem desempenho, praticidade e sofistica√ß√£o em um s√≥ produto‚Äù, diz Rivelino Gama, diretor executivo de Neg√≥cios da Infinix na Positivo Tecnologia.
O rel√≥gio XWatch 3 WE chega ao Brasil como uma tentativa da marca para concorrer na categoria de wearables com boa rela√ß√£o de custo-benef√≠cio. De acordo com a Positivo Tecnologia (empresa que representa a Infinix em territ√≥rio brasileiro), o pre√ßo sugerido do produto √© de R$ 499. Compras √† vista via Pix ganham um desconto de 10%.
Outro atrativo do smartwatch da marca √© a compatibilidade com as plataformas Android e iOS. A marca tamb√©m aposta em um design pr√≥ximo de rel√≥gios de categorias mais premium. A ideia √© atrair consumidores que buscam um visual mais elegante para integrar ao seu estilo.
‚ÄúNosso objetivo √© atender √†s necessidades de um p√∫blico que busca um smartwatch que funciona muito bem no dia a dia e que complementa perfeitamente seu estilo de vida‚Äù, afirma Rivelino.

author: Daniel Wagner
title: Canucks solve Buffalo snowstorm travel dilemma, will fly from Toronto - Vancouver Is Awesome
text: The Vancouver Canucks are no longer trapped in Buffalo. The city of Buffalo faced blizzard conditions over the weekend, made worse by what meteorologists call "lake effect snow," as cold air moves across the Great Lakes to cause narrow bands of heavy snow. The snow was heavy enough to postpone the Buffalo Bills playoff game against the Pittsburgh Steelers to Monday, but the Canucks game against the Buffalo Sabres went on as planned on Saturday, with the Canucks eking out a 1-0 win. What didn't go as planned was the Canucks' travel after the game. They had planned to fly out of Buffalo after the game with the intention of getting into Columbus, OH well ahead of their game scheduled for 1 p.m. local time, 10 a.m. PST against the Columbus Blue Jackets. The snowstorm grounded all aircraft, however, as all flights inbound or outbound were cancelled, meaning [the Canucks were stuck overnight in Buffalo](https://www.vancouverisawesome.com/canucks-hockey/canucks-plane-out-of-buffalo-cancelled-due-to-snowstorm-8106776). The Canucks were evidently still unable to fly out of Buffalo on Sunday morning. While a travel ban for passenger and commercial vehicles was still in effect on Sunday morning for most of Erie County, which covers the city of Buffalo, the Canucks were still able to get out of the city and cross the border into Canada, where they intend to fly out of Toronto, ON. A plane with the flight number ACA7037, one of two numbers typically used by the Canucks for their chartered flights, was scheduled to fly from Toronto to Columbus at 2 p.m. local time, though the estimated departure time has been delayed to 6:10 p.m. That means the Canucks should still arrive in Columbus by Sunday evening, with hopefully enough time to get a good night's rest before Monday's oddly-timed game. At the very least, the Canucks don't have to spend any more time in Buffalo.

author: Gazzetta dello sport
title: Liga: Real campione di Spagna | Gazzetta.it
text: Campione allo stadio, ma davanti al televisore. Il Madrid ha vinto la sua 36a Liga dopo aver battuto 3-0 il Cadice e restando poi al Bernabeu a vedere Girona-Barcellona. Il Real aveva bisogno che il Bar√ßa non vincesse: la squadra di Xavi √® andata due volte in vantaggio ma ha perso 4-2, come all‚Äôandata a Montjuic. Il Girona, prima stagione in Liga nel 2017, √® matematicamente e storicamente in Champions e a 4 giornate dalla fine ha superato i rivali al secondo posto, che vale l‚Äôaccesso alla Supercoppa europea e ai suoi milioni. A Montilivi festa sfrenata. Per il Madrid una Liga colossale: una sola sconfitta, in settembre al Metropolitano contro l‚ÄôAtletico, e da allora 28 giornate di imbattibilit√†, eguagliato il record del club stabilito nel 1990 con Toshack. Per Ancelotti titolo numero 26 in carriera e 12 col Madrid: +1 su Zidane e -2 sul mito Miguel Mu√±oz, che potr√† essere superato la prossima stagione. Ancelotti ha vinto due Liga negli ultimi 3 anni ed √® arrivato a 6 titoli nazionali: quello spagnolo √® il suo primo ‚Äòdoblete‚Äô in un campionato. Al Bernabeu aria di festa e sfida impari tra due squadre alla fine separate da 61 punti, col Madrid alla settima vittoria consecutiva e il Cadice in zona retrocessione. Carlo ha fatto un turnover massiccio cambiando 10 uomini rispetto alla partita di Monaco col Bayern. Confermato solo Nacho, chiamato ad affrontare il fratello Alex. Tra i pali √® tornato Courtois, dopo 355 giorni di assenza per la rottura di un legamento e poi di un menisco. Il belga √® stato decisivo: dopo un primo tempo senza emozioni Chris Ramos si √® presentato solo davanti al belga che si √® fatto enorme e ha fermato il tiro dell‚Äôavversario, e sul rovesciamento di fronte Brahim si √® inventato un gran gol con un tiro sul palo lontano quando era circondato da 3 avversari. Sesto gol in Liga, decimo stagionale. Cadice depresso e Madrid di nuovo in gol con Bellingham, appena entrato e servito dallo stesso ex milanista, e nel recupero con Joselu, che un attimo prima aveva preso il palo, rete gentilmente offertagli da Nacho. Al Bernabeu i giocatori hanno festeggiato in campo e si sono poi messi a vedere la partita in tv dentro lo stadio, la polizia ha transennato la fontana di Cibeles in previsione delle feste dei parrocchiani blancos. A Montilivi inizio frenetico: gol spettacolare di Christensen, controllo di petto su gran taglio di Lamine Yamal e destro al volo incrociato dopo 2 minuti e 34 secondi, Girona che batte e in un‚Äôazione che passa dai piedi di Miguel Gutierrez e Ivan Martin arriva al pareggio con un colpo di testa di Dovbyk al 3‚Äô44‚Äù, 70 secondi dopo. L‚Äôucraino, a segno nelle ultime 5 giornate, difende il pichichi: ha fatto 20 gol, 2 in pi√π di Bellingham e 3 in pi√π di Sorloth e Lewandowski, che nel recupero del primo tempo dopo una traversa di Gundogan ha trasformato un rigore non visto dall‚Äôarbitro e assegnato al Var per un fallo di Miguel Gutierrez sul solito eccezionale Lamine Yamal. Nella ripresa la partita √® rimasta aperta, con occasioni per entrambe le squadre. Decisiva il cambio di Portu per Tsygankov. Al 65‚Äô, entrato giusto qualche secondo prima, Portu ha pareggiato su assist di Dovbyk lanciato in maniera sciagurata da SergI Roberto. E al 67‚Äô, dopo appena 118 secondi, gara rovesciata: contropiede del Girona aperto da un altro errore di Sergi Roberto, Aleix Garcia lancia Portu che serve Miguel Gutierrez, tiro deviato da Kounde e Girona in vantaggio. L‚Äôincredibile Portu al 75‚Äô ha suggellato il magnifico pomeriggio del Girona con un golazo fenomenale: destro al volo spettacolare in diagonale su lancio di Savio dalla trequarti. Nella pancia del Bernabeu √® partita la festa dei giocatori, mentre i tifosi del Madrid hanno iniziato ad avviarsi sul Paseo de la Castellana verso Plaza de Cibeles. La Liga √® in bacheca, mercoled√¨ pu√≤ arrivare anche la finale di Champions.

author: Cory Pappas
title: Denver Broncos Sean Payton Praises, Believes In Former Oregon Receiver Troy Franklin
text: Denver Broncos Sean Payton Praises, Believes In Former Oregon Receiver Troy Franklin Former Oregon Ducks star wideout Troy Franklin was drafted 102nd overall by the Denver Broncos in the 2024 NFL Draft. In Franklin‚Äôs last season with the Ducks, he had 81 catches for 1,383 yards and 14 touchdowns. Franklin is now trying to find his footing in the NFL with Denver. Sean Payton Remains Optimistic on Former Oregon Duck, Troy Franklin Former Oregon Ducks wideout, Troy Franklin, saw minimal action in the three Broncos preseason games. He had only 1 catch for 21 yards and 1 rush for 9 yards. However, Broncos coach Sean Payton remains bullish on Franklin. Payton said about a week ago when talking about Troy Franklin; ‚ÄúI like where he‚Äôs at relative to his progress.‚Äù and ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs smart. He picks things up‚Ä¶.I‚Äôm excited about him.‚Äù Franklin may be inactive in the first few games of the season while he continues to show progression. In the NFL, things change rapidly, so we could see Franklin have a much bigger role faster than expected. What will help Franklin is that Broncos starting quarterback, rookie [Bo Nix](https://www.si.com/college/oregon/football/quarterback-bo-nix-named-denver-broncos-captain-makes-history-oregon-ducks-football-nfl-rookie-fantasy-football), was Franklin‚Äôs college quarterback at Oregon for the past two seasons. These two had great chemistry together and hope to rekindle that with the Broncos. The Denver Broncos open up their season on Sunday afternoon in Seattle against the Seahawks. Troy Franklin Looks to Carry His Oregon Success to the NFL Troy Franklin was a stud for the [Ducks](https://www.si.com/college/oregon/football/oregon-ducks-release-next-generation-o-uniforms-mighty-oregon-dan-lanning-big-ten-nike) during his time at Oregon. Over his three-season collegiate career with the Ducks, Franklin tallied 2,483 receiving yards and 25 touchdowns. Franklin‚Äôs final two seasons in Eugene were with current Broncos starting quarterback Bo Nix under center. Franklin was Nix‚Äôs favorite target last season. Franklin set numerous receiving records for the Ducks in 2023. He set Oregon single-season records in receiving yards with 1,383 yards, receiving touchdowns with 14, and 100-yard receiving games with 8. Additionally, Franklin‚Äôs 81 receptions last season were the second most in [Oregon](https://www.si.com/college/oregon/football/oregon-ducks-legends-predict-ohio-state-chip-kelly-defeat-oregon-big-ten-college-football-dan-lanning-ryan-day) history. He left Oregon as the school‚Äôs all-time leader in receiving touchdowns with 25 touchdowns. Broncos Wide Receiver Room Around Troy Franklin The Denver Broncos have five wide receivers on their current depth chart as they head into [Week One](https://www.si.com/college/oregon/football/oregon-ducks-football-mentioned-college-gameday-week-one-kirk-herbstreit-dan-lanning-nick-saban-dillon-gabriel). The receivers are Courtland Sutton, Josh Reynolds, Marvin Mims Jr., Devaughn Vele, and Troy Franklin. Out of these five, only Sutton and Mims Jr. were on the Broncos last season. Denver is still trying to find an identity heading into coach Sean Payton‚Äôs second year. The Broncos have failed to make the playoffs since the 2015-16 season. With a new rookie quarterback and new weapons around him, the [Denver Broncos](https://www.si.com/college/oregon/football/ducks-Denver-broncos-secretive-fascination-Bo-nix-quarterback-nfl-draft) have a reason to be more optimistic about what the future has in store for them. [MORE: How To Watch Oregon Ducks vs. Boise State: Channel, Streaming, Big Ten Blackout?](https://www.si.com/college/oregon/football/how-watch-oregon-ducks-boise-state-channel-streaming-big-ten-network-blackout-dan-lanning-autzen-dillon-gabriel) [More: Oregon Ducks Coach Wears Statement T-Shirt Before Boise State](https://www.si.com/college/oregon/football/oregon-ducks-coach-wears-statement-t-shirt-before-boise-state-dan-lanning-preview-big-ten) [MORE: Quarterback Bo Nix Named Denver Broncos Captain, Makes History](https://www.si.com/college/oregon/football/quarterback-bo-nix-named-denver-broncos-captain-makes-history-oregon-ducks-football-nfl-rookie-fantasy-football) [MORE: [WATCH] Oregon Ducks Coach Dan Lanning Locker Room 'Disappointed' Speech Shows His Greatness](https://www.si.com/college/oregon/football/watch-oregon-ducks-coach-dan-lanning-locker-room-disappointed-speech-shows-greatness-lsu-tigers-brian-kelly) [MORE: Oregon Ducks Football Release Uniforms for Boise State Matchup: PHOTOS](https://www.si.com/college/oregon/football/oregon-ducks-football-uniforms-for-boise-state-big-ten-green-dan-lanning) [MORE: Oregon Ducks CB Dontae Manning Reveals Team's Mindset: 'Went to See the Doctor'](https://www.si.com/college/oregon/football/oregon-ducks-dontae-manning-dan-lanning-tosh-lupoi-big-ten-idaho-boise-state-defense)

author: FOCUS-online-Redaktion
title: "Only Fans"-Model sitzt in Trumps Abschiebe-Haft: wie sie ihren Anwalt finanzieren will - FOCUS online
text:
"Only Fans"-Model sitzt in Trumps Abschiebe-Haft: wie sie ihren Anwalt finanzieren will
- FOCUS-online-Redaktion
Der Einsatz von Crowdfunding zur Finanzierung von Rechtskosten f√ºr abgeschobene oder von der Abschiebung bedrohte Personen in den USA nimmt zu seit der Pr√§sidentschaft von Donald Trump. Eine Kolumbianerin, die in einem Inhaftierungszentrum in Louisiana festgehalten wird, verwendet nun Plattformen wie OnlyFans, um Mittel f√ºr ihre Verteidigung zu sammeln. Das berichtet ‚ÄûUSA Today‚Äú.
Kolumbianerin und ihr Mann k√§mpfen verzweifelt, in den USA zu bleiben
Die Frau kam urspr√ºnglich mit einem Touristenvisum in die USA und bem√ºhte sich, durch ihre Ehe mit einem US-B√ºrger, ihre rechtlichen Aufenthaltsstatus zu kl√§ren. Aufgrund einer Anklage wegen Fahrens unter Alkoholeinfluss wurde sie jedoch von der Einwanderungsbeh√∂rde ICE in Haft genommen.
Auf Plattformen wie der Erotikseite OnlyFans sucht sie nun Unterst√ºtzung, w√§hrend ihr Ehemann finanzielle Unterst√ºtzung bei GoFundMe pr√ºft. ‚ÄûUSA Today‚Äú berichtet, dass andere Familien ebenfalls auf GoFundMe Spenden sammeln, um ihre Verteidigungskosten bestreiten zu k√∂nnen.
Familie entscheidet sich f√ºr freiwillige Ausreise aus den USA
In einem √§hnlichen Kontext hat sich eine Familie in den USA f√ºr eine freiwillige Ausreise entschieden, aufgrund von versch√§rften Abschieberegeln unter Trump. Der Familienvater Julio Mendoza lebte seit seinem 11. Lebensjahr in den USA, doch die Angst vor den Einwanderungsbeamten unter Trump f√ºhrte zur Entscheidung, das Land zu verlassen. Obwohl seine Frau und die Kinder US-B√ºrger sind, f√ºhlten sich alle Mitglieder der Familie Mendoza durch potenziell aggressive ICE-Ma√ünahmen bedroht und zogen es vor, gemeinsam nach Mexiko zu gehen, anstatt eine unsichere Zukunft in den USA zu riskieren.
Ein spezielles Programm, ‚ÄûProject Homecoming‚Äú, erleichterte diesen Schritt zus√§tzlich. Es bietet Migranten, die sich freiwillig zur Ausreise entscheiden, eine Pr√§mie von 1000 Dollar sowie Flugtickets an. Diese Initiative soll f√ºr die USA kosteng√ºnstiger sein als erzwungene Abschiebungen. Bis Anfang April nutzten bereits √ºber 5000 Menschen dieses Programm, um das Land zu verlassen.
topics: Crime, Law and Justice->human smuggling and trafficking

author: Erin Gottsacker
title: How one rural county is expanding access to public transportation | Ideastream Public Media
text:
Up until just a couple years ago, Meigs County in southeast Ohio didn‚Äôt offer public transport. Now, it‚Äôs building a transportation hub .
Since it started offering transit services in 2022, the county has seen ridership more than double.
‚ÄúWe're already above our 2023 numbers,‚Äù said Theresa Lavender, director of public transport and the county‚Äôs department of jobs and family services. ‚ÄúSo the sustainability for ridership is there. The need for transportation is there.‚Äù
She says a transportation hub will allow the county to continue expanding its services.
‚ÄúWe want to make sure people can get to where they need to go,‚Äù Lavender said.
Public transport in rural Ohio Ohio‚Äôs cities have buses and streetcars, but move to the countryside, and public transportation becomes a lot less accessible. According to research from Ohio State University, 83% of urban residents say they have access to transportation near their home, while just 11% of rural residents say the same.
‚ÄúWe get them to medical facilities. We get them to community events. We get them to the local senior citizens office, pharmacies, grocery stores and employment.‚Äù Theresa Lavender, Meigs County Public Transit 25 Ohio counties have no public transit system. Prior to 2022, Meigs County was among them.
‚ÄúWe heard story after story about folks who weren‚Äôt able to leave their house,‚Äù said public transit administrator Adam Warden.
‚ÄúWe're really seeing folks that previously were not able to access the public in general for basic needs. They couldn't go to the grocery stores or make it to special appointments, like dialysis, because they took too long.‚Äù
How public transit helps
Since Meigs County started providing rides, it‚Äôs served more than 700 people. More than half are seniors.
‚ÄúWe get them to medical facilities,‚Äù Lavender said. ‚ÄúWe get them to community events. We get them to the local senior citizens office, pharmacies, grocery stores and employment.‚Äù
The county has very few medical providers, so sometimes transit needs to go beyond county lines.
‚ÄúThat's a big hurdle we're overcoming,‚Äù Lavender said. ‚ÄúGetting people where they need, not only in the county, but outside the county because Meigs County is so rural and vast.‚Äù
Lavender expects the demand for public transit to continue rising.
‚ÄúWe are here to stay,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúAnd we're really going to be able to grow and expand our services.‚Äù
